sequence_name: AI Hustle Engine ‚Äî Starter Kit ‚Üí Accelerator Upsell Sequence
description: 3-email upsell sequence for Starter Kit buyers who haven't purchased the Accelerator. Runs over 7 days post-purchase.

emails.subject: How's Day 1 going? (+ what's waiting for you)
emails.preview_text: You've got the playbook. Here's what comes after the playbook.
emails.goal: Check in warmly, celebrate their action, introduce the Accelerator without pressure. Plant the seed.
emails.html_body:
‚ö° AI Hustle Engine

How's Day 1 going?

You picked up the AI Hustle Starter Kit yesterday. That's a real move ‚Äî most people read about AI income for months without doing anything. You did something.

I hope you've had a chance to dig into the playbook and the prompt vault. If you haven't yet, do it tonight ‚Äî even 20 minutes will give you more clarity than another week of research.

Quick question

Where are you right now? Most people at this stage are in one of three places:

A) 'I read it. I see the opportunity. I need help picking my specific model and getting my first client.'

B) 'I haven't read it yet. Life happened. Getting to it this weekend.'

C) 'I read it, and I want to go deeper and faster than the Starter Kit covers.'

If you're at C ‚Äî I want to tell you about something.

We built the AI Hustle Starter Kit as the entry point. But we also built something for people who are serious about making this a real income stream, not just a project they try once.

The AI Hustle Accelerator ($97)

The Accelerator is a full 12-module video course ‚Äî with templates, a community, and an actual system for building consistent AI income. Here's what's inside:

  • 1The AI Income Landscape ‚Äî What works, what doesn't, and where the money actually is right now
  • 2Choosing Your Model ‚Äî How to pick the right income model for your skills, time, and goals
  • 3Your First Offer ‚Äî Building a specific, sellable service offer that clients actually want
  • 4The Tool Stack ‚Äî Setting up your AI toolkit (free + paid) for maximum efficiency
  • 5Prompt Mastery ‚Äî Advanced prompting techniques that separate $15/hour work from $100/hour work
  • 6Finding Clients ‚Äî Exactly where to find clients, what to say, and how to convert
  • 7Proposals That Win ‚Äî Templates and strategy for winning projects on Upwork, Fiverr, and direct
  • 8Delivery Systems ‚Äî Build a repeatable delivery process so every project is profitable
  • 9Pricing and Raising Rates ‚Äî How to price your services and when to raise rates
  • 10Building Retainers ‚Äî Converting one-time clients to monthly recurring revenue
  • 11Scaling and Outsourcing ‚Äî When and how to delegate so you can take on more
  • 12Building Your AI Business ‚Äî Long-term strategy, agency model, passive income

Plus: 20+ done-for-you templates, the full community Slack, and monthly group audits where we review your business live.

No pressure. Just wanted you to know it exists.

Reply to this email if you have any questions about the Starter Kit ‚Äî I'm watching the inbox.

‚Äî Henry, AI Hustle Engine

You're receiving this because you purchased the AI Hustle Starter Kit at ai-hustle.advancedmedias.com

Unsubscribe ¬∑ Preferences

emails.subject: The $97 investment that pays for itself in a week
emails.preview_text: Let's do some math on the Accelerator. The numbers are pretty hard to argue with.
emails.goal: Make the ROI argument for the Accelerator. Show that $97 is not the real cost ‚Äî the cost is not having the system. Overcome price objection.
emails.html_body:
‚ö° AI Hustle Engine

The $97 investment that pays for itself in a week.

I want to make a purely practical case for the AI Hustle Accelerator. No hype. Just numbers.

The Accelerator is $97. Here's how it pays for itself:

üìä The Math
Average AI email copywriting project (Upwork/Fiverr)$150
Time to complete with AI workflow (Accelerator Module 8)~90 min
Effective hourly rate$100/hr
One project to cover cost of Accelerator1 project
ROI after first project+$53 (and climbing)

And that's assuming you only complete one project with the skills you'll learn. Most Accelerator students book 3‚Äì5 projects in their first 30 days.

The real cost is not $97.

The real cost is the weeks you spend trying to figure this out yourself. Watching YouTube tutorials that contradict each other. Trying to write prompts that produce mediocre output. Pitching clients with no framework and getting ignored.

‚ùå Without the Accelerator
  • 3‚Äì6 weeks figuring out your model
  • Inconsistent prompt quality
  • No proposal templates
  • Pricing by feel
  • First income in 6‚Äì8 weeks (if ever)
‚úÖ With the Accelerator
  • Model chosen by end of Week 1
  • Prompt system built in Week 1
  • Proposals done-for-you
  • Pricing framework built in
  • First income in 7‚Äì14 days

What Accelerator students say

'I spent 2 months watching YouTube trying to figure out AI freelancing. I bought the Accelerator and had my first paying client in 9 days. I wish I'd just bought it first.' ‚Äî Marcus T., AI content strategist

'The proposal templates alone are worth $97. I went from a 10% Upwork response rate to 40% in two weeks.' ‚Äî Jamie L., AI copywriter

Upgrade to the Accelerator ‚Äî $97

Your Starter Kit purchase is already credited. 30-day guarantee applies.

‚Äî Henry, AI Hustle Engine

emails.subject: Last chance ‚Äî Accelerator offer closes tonight
emails.preview_text: This is the last email about upgrading. After tonight, the intro price goes away.
emails.goal: Create legitimate urgency. Final social proof push. Make it easy to say yes. Close the upsell.
emails.html_body:
‚è∞ This upgrade offer expires tonight at midnight
‚ö° AI Hustle Engine

This is the last email about the Accelerator.

I've sent two emails about upgrading. You're still on the Starter Kit. That's completely fine ‚Äî the Starter Kit is genuinely valuable on its own.

But I'm going to make one final case, because I don't want you to wonder 'what if' six months from now.

Here's the real talk:

Most people who buy the Starter Kit and don't upgrade will do one of three things:

1. Read it, get excited, try a couple prompts, then let it sit
2. Get partway through, hit a friction point (usually 'where do I find clients?'), and stall
3. Actually figure it out ‚Äî but spend 2‚Äì3 months doing it the slow way

The Accelerator solves all three. It's not just more content ‚Äî it's the system that turns the Starter Kit from a 'great resource' into 'I have a client and income.'

What people who upgraded are saying

‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
'I almost didn't upgrade. Figured I'd try the Starter Kit first and see. But by Day 3 I knew I needed the full system. Had my first $500 week by Week 3 of the course.'
‚Äî Sarah K., AI content strategist, former teacher
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
'Module 6 alone (Finding Clients) is worth the $97. The scripts for Upwork proposals are the exact words I use now. I copy, customize, send. 35% response rate.'
‚Äî Dev R., AI copywriter, remote from Bangalore
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
'I made $1,800 my first month. I know that sounds like a testimonial a company makes up. I wish I had screenshots ready to send you. The system just works if you do the work.'
‚Äî Maria C., AI email marketer, Florida
AI Hustle Accelerator
$97
  • 12 video modules ‚Äî complete AI income system
  • 20+ done-for-you templates (proposals, pitches, onboarding)
  • Private community Slack (active, real people)
  • Monthly group audit calls (live review of your business)
  • Lifetime access + all future updates
  • 30-day money-back guarantee
Upgrade to the Accelerator ‚Äî $97

Price increases to $147 after tonight. 30-day guarantee still applies.

If not ‚Äî genuinely no hard feelings. Keep the Starter Kit, work through it, and come back whenever you're ready to go deeper. We'll be here.

But if you've been on the fence ‚Äî this is your moment.

‚Äî Henry, AI Hustle Engine
